name: Paul's Plane Game
description:
------ Controls ------

  • Move up: w-key, up-arrow
  • Move down: r-key, s-key, down-arrow
  • Special: space-bar

------ Description -----

Made with Godot Engine!

This was my first complete and (somewhat) polished game... It's still rough around the edges, but I'm quite pleased with the result..

Disclaimer: Game isn't actually endless, but will overflow eventually... It's practically endless though, unless you feel like playing this game for more than 8 hours.. I don't feel like fixing this...

------ Assets I used -------

  • BG: Mountain at Dusk Background, by Ansimuz
  • Font: Montreal-Regular
  • SFX: Original, made using SFXR
  • Music: Original, made using Ardour 6
